testScenarios.scenarioDescription: User logs in with correct credentials
testScenarios.given: that I am on the login page
testScenarios.when: I enter my valid username and password And I click on the login button
testScenarios.then: I should be redirected to the dashboard page And I should see a welcome message with my username

testScenarios.scenarioDescription: User logs in with correct credentials
testScenarios.given: that I am on the login page
testScenarios.when: I enter an invalid username or password And I click on the login button
testScenarios.then: I should stay on the login page And I should see an error message saying "Invalid username or password"

testScenarios.scenarioDescription: User logs in with correct credentials
testScenarios.given: that I am on the login page
testScenarios.when: I click on the "Forgot Password" link And I enter my registered email address And I click on the "Reset Password" button
testScenarios.then: I should be redirected to the password reset page And I should receive an email with a password reset link And I should see a message saying "Please check
